title: WTB: PSA or SGC rare backs
author: stutor

posts.post_title: WTB: PSA or SGC rare backs
posts.post_content:
This is my first post of this nature, so I am curious how it will go. I have been putting together a graded off-back set over the last two years. I try to stay in the 4 to 5 range on grades, but I certainly add esthetic lower grades when possible. I’m not looking to low ball and flip, and I can provide several Net54 references to attest to my sincerity. I’m looking for anything not piedmont, SC or Sovereign (unless it’s a SC ‘no print’ or Sovereign 460 ‘super print’, etc.). I enjoy adding really tough backs (Drum, Uzit, BL, CB, etc), but I also appreciate the 150/350 OMs and collect the Hindu subset. PMs are fine, but I prefer email to [url]sonnytutor@gmail.com[/url]. Thank you for your consideration. 
Sonny
